def req(n):
	ans=0
	while n:
		dig=n%10
		if dig%2==0:
			ans+=2*dig
		else:
			ans+=dig
		n=n/10
	return ans%10

t=int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
	a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())
	res=0
	while a<b and a%10!=0:
		res+=req(a)
		a+=1
	while a<b and b%10!=0:
		res+=req(b)
		b-=1
	res+=req(b)

	res+=((b-a)/10)*45
	#x=(b-a)%10
	#for k in range(b-x,b+1):
		
	#	res+=req(k)
	print res
